titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army to update each water control manual of the Corps of Engineers regarding the Apalachicola-Chattahoochee-Flint River system to include reallocation of storage to meet current and future municipal and industrial water supply needs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to update each water control manual of the Corps of Engineers regarding the Apalachicola-Chattahoochee-Flint River system to include reallocation of storage to meet current and future municipal and industrial water supply needs.
